name: Gun-Mod
description:
Currently In-Developement

This is a brief prototype showcasing some basic enemies, level transition and a single boss. I am uploading at this point for a game jam which I developed this prototype for.  This is my new project and I will try to provide an update every two weeks. The goal is to complete the development of the game within the next 6 months with the Alpha build of the game posted by August.

(All Art and Audio will be redone at a later time in the development of this game)

Controls (Currently):

A Key => Move Left

D Key => Move Right

W or Spacebar => Jump

W or Spacebar => Double Jump (Once the Puise Mod is collected)

Left Arrow => Shoot Left

Right Arrow => Shoot Right

Up Arrow => Shoot Up

Down Arrow => Shoot Down
